concept.title: Querying
concept.shortdesc: provides a SQL-like querying language called OQL that allows you to access data stored in regions.

conbody.p: Since regions are key-value stores where values can range from simple byte arrays to complex nested objects, uses a query syntax based on OQL (Object Query Language) to query region data. OQL is very similar to SQL, but OQL allows you to query complex objects, object attributes, and methods.
